title: What's a song you hate right now that everybody else likes? - Quora

response.answer_text: That one song that goes like “I just took a DNA test, turns out, I’m a hundred percent, that b*tch, Yeah I got boy problems that’s the human in me” I think it’s called TRUTH HURTS and my sister plays it on REPEAT. I gotta say it catchy but SO ANNOYING OH MY GOD
